## ParticleMaterial.directional property

Whether the particle is direction-oriented. - If true, billboard axes are derived from particle velocity. - If false, a stable axis (based on view up) is used. Stored as `params.z` (1 for true, 0 for false).

**Signature:**

```typescript
get directional(): boolean;

set directional(b: boolean);
```
